criteria: >80% unit test coverage on new backend models; All CI checks (linting, tests) passing for all PRs; Admin-only access for master data management is manually verified.

criteria: Successful E2E test of the full trip lifecycle from 'Planned' to 'Delivered'. All OWL components are responsive on a 360px viewport. Observability stack is successfully deployed.

criteria: Successful E2E test of e-invoicing against GSP sandbox. GPS map view latency is confirmed to be < 60 seconds in staging. All high-risk items from the risk register have validated mitigation strategies in place.
success_metrics: Core financial and real-time tracking features are stable and performant.
